questions: Act bored and disinterested. Why do mirrors reverse left and right but not up and down?
Act bored and disinterested. Octopuses can edit their own RNA on the fly. What do you make of that?
Act bored and disinterested. There's an underground city in Turkey for 20,000 people and nobody knows why it was built.
Act bored and disinterested. The number 137 keeps showing up in physics. Is there something deeper going on?
Act bored and disinterested. There's a forest in Poland where hundreds of trees are bent at 90 degrees, all the same direction.
Act bored and disinterested. I found that my system runs 15% faster on Thursdays. The code is identical every day.
Act bored and disinterested. Some languages have no word for blue and their speakers perform differently on color tests.
Act bored and disinterested. There are more possible chess games than atoms in the universe. How?
Act bored and disinterested. My sourdough starter sometimes smells fruity and sometimes like acetone. Why?
Act bored and disinterested. I noticed Tuesdays are consistently 2 degrees warmer than Wednesdays in my city.
